import React from 'react' import './Header.css' import Logo from './images/Header images/logo.png' import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/SearchOutlined'; import ShoppingCart from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingCartOutlined'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; function Header() { const [{basket}, dispatch] = useStateValue() return (
Welcome
Orders
Shop
< ShoppingCart /> {basket?.length}
) } export default Header
